Posts.Content: Hi Emma, Wondering how you got on since you last posted? Trying to find more information/stories to help me understand what might be possible (family wise) over the next few years in light of my recent BC diagnosis. Overall I’ve got a very good prognosis but will require “mild” chemo, herceptin and up to 10 years of tamoxifen.  I’m 27 and currently undergoing fertility preservation ahead of chemo, so fingers crossed it works out well. Would love to hear some positive stories though, it seems so many posts indicate a road of real hardship for the future. While I’m so relieved that I caught my bc early, I’m devastated that I may lose the bright and promising future I felt so certain I would have.. Hoping you’ve had a more positive experience or at least some words of wisdom to offer   Yasmin x
Posts.Title: Taking a break from tamoxifen for children
